data.actual_result: it resets every time you open the overlay
data.expected_result: it should remember the opacity setting
data.short_description: opacity resets every time you open overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - open a game. open the overlay and check everything. - click show window in game. adjust the opacity. - close the overlay and the game. repeat step 1 and 2 but observe the opacity setting.
